title: Matheus Zanetti
text:
Hello, I’m I’m a Ph.D. student in the Department of Political Science at Florida State University.
Before starting my doctoral program at FSU, I earned a master’s degree in law, a law degree, and a degree in International Relations from Pontifícia Universidade Católica de Minas Gerais (PUC Minas), Brazil.
I study judicial politics and political behavior, focusing on: - how judges’ individual characteristics shape judicial decision-making; - descriptive representation in judging and how the public perceives judges’ identities; - public opinion about courts and how citizens respond to institutional symbols; - judicial elections, interbranch conflict, and attacks on courts.
Feel free to contact me at mmoreirazanetti@fsu.edu
